arts.ttl: Ugbo benched: Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI to face Southampton
arts.sum: The latest Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI as Henrik Pedersen's side gear up to face Southampton on Saturday. The post Ugbo benched: Sheffield Wednesday team news and predicted XI to face Southampton appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Southampton vs Sheffield Wednesday predictions: Saints too slick for crisis club
arts.sum: Southampton have not made a great start to the season following their relegation but Aaron Ashley believes they can improve their position of 19th when they host basement boys Sheffield Wednesday on Saturday.
